DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine the incidence of Bone Fractures in HIV infected patients in Spain
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study to Determine the Incidence of Bone Fractures in HIV-infected Patients in Spain
DOC.detailed_description: Study to know the incidence of bone fractures in HIV patients, determine associate factors to bone fractures, the type of patients with fractures.
DOC.criteria: HIV infection Signed ICF Patient that fulfill these: Osteroporosis associated fracture Enough information close to the moment of the fracture patients with cognitive impairment
